website_summaries.verdict: Nike reinterprets the standard design of the Air Force 1 and turning it into a boot-like silhouette. The result is the Son Of Force Mid Winter, which displays a supremely versatile silhouette that enables users to wear in a wide gamut of clothing.Its durability outlasting several brands also makes it a tough shoe that can be sported with several activities in all seasons and occasions. Without sacrificing stability, the Son Of Force Mid Winter ensures a lightweight model that serves superior comfort.
pros: Many wearers say the Nike Son Of Force Mid Winter provides utmost comfort
Several buyers praise the shoe's durability and remark that it lasts longer compared to other similar boots
Some users declare that this winter apparel has enough support and has a nice ankle height
An astounding number of customers love the shoe's superb style and framework
A few wearers of these sneakers confirm that this kick kept their feet warm and dry during the cold season
Staying classy with its Air Force 1-inspired silhouette and colorways, this kick adequately matches many outfits, according to some users
A few reviewers proved this shoe’s versatility
cons: The shoe's flat rubber cupsole lacks cushioning, disappointing several users
A couple of wearers are a bit annoyed with the noise that the metal eyelets make when walking

customer_reviews.title: Shoe coming about after two months!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these in Kohls and really liked them. They did not have my size so I decided to check Amazon and found them. I really love these shows. However I have had them for two months and they are already coming apart. See pic below. Just below the top two laces the shoe is split some. That is the area that is coming apart on both shoes. I wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Hatman41

customer_reviews.title: Nice, all weather basketball shoez
customer_reviews.text: Nice, all weather basketball shoez. Took a little while to get used to since I usually wear low-tops and my ankles were a little irritated at first. Nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Jaytee

customer_reviews.title: Dunkin in style
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! I'm really into Jordan 1's and wanted to get some for my son but, he destroys shoes like no one else. I decided to try these out as they had a similar profile and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: John r soriano

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe , Unique but i got it with no box! I know you trying to save the envoirment but thats dropling the shoe value and the full package feeling. It is original and beautiful , Still a little vit dissapointed avout the box. Got the olive color.
customer_reviews.author: SM AKA

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great. But be careful when wet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. But be careful when wet, they dont grip on certain surfaces. Also "squeak" like ur trying to cross Kobe on the court.
customer_reviews.author: josh stone

customer_reviews.title: Nike Wheats
customer_reviews.text: Size 14 shoes as described. Roomy, not narrow or tight. Fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Crisp
customer_reviews.text: Very clean shoes, love them and they seem pretty resistant to wet conditions, i pretty much treat them like boots.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son exactly as expected. They are being used on the basketball court and are holding up well.

customer_reviews.title: As Expected

customer_reviews.title: A very satisfied customer

customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend...I wish I could find them in my size! Everytime he wears them, I get jealous...haha

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pair. Not available through nike anymore but was able to find through amazon

customer_reviews.text: This shoe is pretty good. But it doesn't hint will cost me over 50 dollars of tax charge. It is totally too much in Chinese marcket.

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is a real head turner. I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a real head turner. I've had strangers stop me to ask where I got them. It's a shame Nike stopped making them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dope shoe but something went wrong with design
customer_reviews.text: Dope looking shoe, and super comfortable but as others have noted the stitching comes undone, seems like a design flaw...it’s a shame they have this problem and I’m not the only one because I’d buy them in a few different colors if not...

customer_reviews.text: do not buy these are not real Nikes they are fake

customer_reviews.title: As usual.....Nike doing it right, keeping it tight!
customer_reviews.text: Great winter sneakers. Synthetic leather is water resistant and this specific model goes great with jeans. Great shoe to rock during cold and nasty weather in the city!
customer_reviews.author: Hanan Family

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Son of Force Mid Winter Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: The Nike Son of Force Mid is a classic. It features a perforated upper that lets your foot breath without sacrificing any stability and comfort. It has a high collar for extra ankle support and a comfortable all-day fit. The foam sole provides lightweight cushioning and a rubber outsole gives traction. An all around classic that combines style with durability and comfort.
